AT.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
AT.description: Kehre für ein urtypisches Abenteuer im Geiste der Super Nintendo-Klassiker zu Yoshis Eiland zurück. Yoshi kann sich nicht nur mit Baby Mario und Baby Luigi verbünden, sondern auch mit Babyversionen von Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario und selbst von Bowser. Yoshi kann sich sogar in einen Hubschrauber, Panzer oder U-Boot verwandeln! Ziehe durch fünf ausgedehnte Welten, während du die einzigartigen Fähigkeiten jedes Baby-Kumpans - von Baby Marios Sprinttechnik über Baby DKs Schaukelfähigkeit bis zu Baby Bowsers Feueratem - benutzt und verhindere die Pläne des bösen Kamek.

AU.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
AU.description: Return to Yoshi’s Island for an original adventure in the spirit of the Super Nintendo classic. Yoshi can team up with not only Baby Mario and Baby Luigi but also baby versions of Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario and even Bowser. Yoshi can even transform into a helicopter, tank or submarine! Traverse five sprawling worlds by using the unique abilities of each baby sidekick – from Baby Mario’s dash technique, to Baby DK’s swing ability, to Baby Bowser’s fiery breath – and stop the evil Kamek’s plans.

BG.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
BG.description: Return to Yoshi’s Island for an original adventure in the spirit of the Super Nintendo classic. Yoshi can team up with not only Baby Mario and Baby Luigi but also baby versions of Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario and even Bowser. Yoshi can even transform into a helicopter, tank or submarine! Traverse five sprawling worlds by using the unique abilities of each baby sidekick – from Baby Mario’s dash technique, to Baby DK’s swing ability, to Baby Bowser’s fiery breath – and stop the evil Kamek’s plans.

BE.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
BE.description: Retourne sur Yoshi's Island pour vivre une aventure originale dans l'esprit du classique de la Super Nintendo. En plus de Bébé Mario et Bébé Luigi, Yoshi peut faire équipe avec les versions bébé de Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario et même Bowser. Yoshi peut même se transformer en hélicoptère, en tank ou en sous-marin ! Traverse cinq mondes tentaculaires en utilisant les compétences de chacun de tes camarades – depuis l'accélération de Bébé Mario jusqu'à la compétence de balancement de Bébé DK, en passant par le souffle enflammé de Bébé Bowser – et mets fin aux plans du maléfique Kamek.

ES.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
ES.description: Vuelve a la isla de Yoshi para disfrutar de esta original aventura al más puro estilo clásico de Super Nintendo. Yoshi contará con la ayuda no solo de Bebé Mario y Bebé Luigi, sino también de versiones bebé de Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario y hasta Bowser. ¡Yoshi puede incluso transformarse en helicóptero, tanque y submarino! Atraviesa cinco vastos mundos utilizando las habilidades únicas de cada compañero bebé – desde la técnica de correr de Bebé Mario, a la habilidad de balancearse de Bebé DK y el abrasador aliento de Bebé Bowser – y desbarata los planes del malvado Kamek.

IT.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
IT.description: Torna a Yoshi's Island per un'avventura originale nello spirito dei classici Super Nintendo. Yoshi potrà far coppia non solo con Baby Mario e Baby Luigi, ma anche con le versioni baby di Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario e perfino Bowser. Adesso Yoshi potrà trasformarsi in un elicottero, un carro armato o un sottomarino! Viaggia attraverso cinque immensi mondi per fermare i piani del perfido Kamek, utilizzando le abilità uniche di ogni compagno di avventura; dallo scatto di Baby Mario all'agilità di Baby Donkey Kong sulle liane, fino all'alito infuocato di Bowser.

LT.description: Return to Yoshi’s Island for an original adventure in the spirit of the Super Nintendo classic. NL.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
NL.description: Keer terug naar Yoshi's Island voor een origineel avontuur in de geest van de klassieke Super Nintendo. Yoshi kan niet alleen samenwerken met Baby Mario en Baby Luigi, maar ook met babyversies van Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario en zelfs Bowser. Bovendien kan Yoshi in een helikopter, tank of onderzeeër veranderen! Doorkruis uitgestrekte werelden door de unieke vaardigheden van elke baby te gebruiken. Van Baby Mario's sprinttechniek tot Baby Donkey Kongs zwaaivaardigheid tot Baby Bowsers vurige adem. Stop de plannen van de kwade Kamek.

NZ.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
NZ.description: Return to Yoshi’s Island for an original adventure in the spirit of the Super Nintendo classic. Yoshi can team up with not only Baby Mario and Baby Luigi but also baby versions of Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario and even Bowser. Yoshi can even transform into a helicopter, tank or submarine! Traverse five sprawling worlds by using the unique abilities of each baby sidekick – from Baby Mario’s dash technique, to Baby DK’s swing ability, to Baby Bowser’s fiery breath – and stop the evil Kamek’s plans.

PL.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
PL.description: Return to Yoshi’s Island for an original adventure in the spirit of the Super Nintendo classic. Yoshi can team up with not only Baby Mario and Baby Luigi but also baby versions of Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario and even Bowser. Yoshi can even transform into a helicopter, tank or submarine! Traverse five sprawling worlds by using the unique abilities of each baby sidekick – from Baby Mario’s dash technique, to Baby DK’s swing ability, to Baby Bowser’s fiery breath – and stop the evil Kamek’s plans.

PT.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
PT.description: Regressa à Yoshi's Island para uma aventura original no mesmo espírito do clássico original da Super Nintendo. O Yoshi pode fazer equipa não só com o Mario Bebé e com o Luigi Bebé, mas também com as versões bebés da Peach, do Donkey Kong, do Wario e do Bowser. O Yoshi poderá até transformar-se num helicóptero, num tanque, ou num submarino! Atravessa cinco mundos gigantescos usando as habilidades únicas de cada companheiro bebé - da técnica de corrida do Mario Bebé à capacidade do DK Bebé de se balançar em lianas e ao bafo de fogo do Bowser Bebé - para impedir os planos do malvado Kamek.

RU.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
RU.description: Посетите остров Yoshi’s Island и окунитесь в приключение в стиле оригинальной игры на Super Nintendo. Йоши может играть не только с Малышом Марио и Малышом Луиджи, но и с Малышкой Пич, Малышом ДК, Малышом Варио, и даже Малышом Боузером. А еще Йоши может превратиться в вертолет, танк и подводную лодку! Посетите пять завораживающих миров и победите злого Камека, используя особые способности каждого маленького помощника — от скорости Малыша Марио до способности раскачиваться Малыша ДК и огненным дыханием Малыша Боузера.

SE.name: Yoshi’s Island DS™
SE.description: Return to Yoshi’s Island for an original adventure in the spirit of the Super Nintendo classic. Yoshi can team up with not only Baby Mario and Baby Luigi but also baby versions of Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario and even Bowser. Yoshi can even transform into a helicopter, tank or submarine! Traverse five sprawling worlds by using the unique abilities of each baby sidekick – from Baby Mario’s dash technique, to Baby DK’s swing ability, to Baby Bowser’s fiery breath – and stop the evil Kamek’s plans.
